items.sentence: Do you really want me to give your computer to Tom?
His story was too ridiculous for anyone to believe.
Tom said he doesn\'t know how to solve the problem.
I\'ve asked Tom to go to the bus stop to meet Mary.
I\'ve seen this movie at least three times already.
Have you already carried the boxes up to the attic?
Have you ever tried feeding your dog peanut butter?
He returned to Japan after graduating from college.
He satisfied his thirst with a large glass of beer.
I spent the entire morning filling out these forms.
